title: Drawing, "Cabinet", 1925–35
medium: Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, with ruled border in graphite
description: Built-in paneling with cabinets, and open shelves. At left is a curtain or fluted column or pilaster. Cabinet unit extends from wall at right angle with center section open, shallow counter space. Surface of counter is probably mirrored, or has lighting feature. Two-door cupboard below with simple knob handles. Door at right. Right wall has continuation of cabinetry, with a two-door cupboard at center, simple knob handles.Ventilation (?) or three decorative slats below cupboard.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Cabinet", 1925–35.
1925–35. Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, with ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-317.
